page.title: 04The Parish Priest
page.content: I am the Parish Priest of Walsingham;my name is{John Barnes.}I teach the Christian faith,celebrate the sacraments of the church,and care for God's people in this village as my predecessors have done for a thousand years.Our Parish Church,{ {St.Mary's,}stands on its ancient site.In the course of the centuries it has been rebuilt and extended,and 20 years ago it was{gutted by fire.} Splendidly rebuilt,it stands as God's presence in the midst of his people.There are two other churches in this Parish,{St.Peters}at Gt.Walsingham,and{St.Giles}at Houghton.On Sundays the Eucharist is offered in each of them,and about one hundred people in all are present at the three Altars.In the Summer,pilgrims to the Shrine at Walsingham join in our worship.
